title: Calories in Cornstarch
meta_description: Discover calories in cornstarch per 100 g, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for cooking and baking uses.
assumptions: Plain, unmodified cornstarch, dry powder; standard commercial variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, processing, and additives; values are approximate. Check product labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of cornstarch contains about 381 kcal, mostly from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mixed with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of cornstarch?

faqs.a: Yes, about 91 g carbs per 100 g, with minimal protein or fat.
Around 30 kcal for 1 tbsp (8 g), mostly carbohydrates.

faqs.q: Does cornstarch have fiber or sugar?
faqs.a: Low fiber (0.9 g per 100 g) and no added sugars.

faqs.q: How does cornstarch compare to flour calories?
faqs.a: Similar; cornstarch has ~381 kcal/100 g vs. ~364 kcal for all-purpose flour.
